description: .T.E.S.T: Expected Behavior is a first-person brain twister with a sci-fi plot. On top of logic, you'll need a fast reaction speed, "outside the box" reasoning, and the skill to adapt to unfamiliar situations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, Intel HD 3000, or equivalent integrated card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
